wikitext.*:
<noinclude>仅用于V+各类XX曲页面。</noinclude><includeonly><!--{if !isset($wgVocaloidSongCounter) || !$wgVocaloidSongCounter}--><!--{assign var="wgVocaloidSongCounter" value=true scope="global"}--><script>
window.RLQ = window.RLQ || [];
window.RLQ.push(function(){
    mw.loader.implement("widgetVocaloidSongCounter",function($, jQuery){
        $(function(){
            $('#count').text($('.legendary-song-card').not('.hide').length);
            $('.VocaloidCount').show();
        });
    });
});</script><style>.VocaloidCount{display:none}</style><!--{/if}--></includeonly>
